channel.title: Need help with the item spawning ID
channel.description:
It says to do the following on the help topic:
::pickup itemid amout = Spawns requested item(s)
So would I type it like this:
::pickup bronze dagger 3
and that giving me three bronze daggers? Or am I getting this totally wrong? I'm sorry I cannot test this myself for I'm at my grampa's house. He has no up-to-date java and won't let me download anything.
I won't be back at my own house untill a week so I thought I'd ask away over here to find out.

item.title: Need help with the item spawning ID

kinda already answered it…

item.title: Need help with the item spawning ID
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

If you press “help” on your mopar menu go down to item id’s you search what u want and use this format
: ::pickup #### #
Item Id-^ ^number of the item u want

There you go

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with the item spawning ID
item.dc:creator: @hypnoticpimp hypnoticpimp
item.description:
@hypnoticpimp wrote:

lmao naw yo like this

::pickup 4151 1

[glow=red,2,300]4151 is the item’s code [/glow]

and 1 is how many of the item so like if u wanted 1000 blood runes ud find its item code

which is 0565 and ud put it like this [glow=red,2,300]::pickup 0565 1000[/glow]

you CAN get ur item codes here http://kulma.ath.cx/rs/items/

or u ken get em in ur items.cfg

hope dat helpzz

Read full topic
